attributes.action: regulate the way that high street banks make charges on overdrafts, so that they are stopped from ripping off their account holders. The imposing of excessive charges and employment of underhand practice, is in need of control.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: High street banks are being challenged by their account holders and the courts, but no intervention has been seen by the PM or the treasury. Millions of British citizens are extorted each day. It is the duty of government to protect their ellectorate from unfair practice. Banks cannot use misrepresented power, and given that they are clearly unable to self regulate, it is governments duty to step in and represent the people who rely on the protection of government.
